<table border="0" width="100%"> <tbody> <tr> <td align="center"> <a href="index.html"><img border="0" alt="Bouncing Box using Simulink" title="Bouncing Box using Simulink" hspace="10" src="BouncingBoxSimulinkLooping.png" width="237" height="121" align="middle"/></a> </td> <td align="left"> <p> The <a href="http://www.mathworks.com/products/matlab" target="_blank">Matlab</a> toolkit from <a href="http://www.mathworks.com" target="_blank">Mathworks</a> includes numerous mathematical and scientific packages. <a href="http://www.mathworks.com/products/simulink" target="_blank">Simulink</a> can be used for <a href="http://www.mathworks.com/examples/product-group/simulink-simulation-graphics-and-reporting" target="_blank">animation visualization using VRML models</a>, which are easily created from X3D. X3D models can be converted to VRML for use with Simulink and other Matlab tools. <p> <p> <a href="http://web3D2015.web3D.org" target="_blank">Web3D 2015 conference</a> resources: <a href="BouncingBoxSimulinkProject.slx" target="_blank">Simulink&nbsp;demo</a>, <a href="BouncingBoxSimulinkX3D-Web3D2015PosterPaperChengBrutzman.pdf" target="_blank">poster&nbsp;paper</a>, <a href="MatlabSimulinkX3D-Web3D2015FastForwardChengBrutzman.pptx" target="_blank">Fast Forward slides</a> (<a href="MatlabSimulinkX3D-Web3D2015FastForwardChengBrutzman.pdf" target="_blank">.pdf</a>) and <a href="MatlabSimulinkBouncingBoxVrmlDemo.mov" target="_blank">video</a>. <p> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table>
